#summary Default Template by McoreD
#labels Phase-Support

= Disc.txt =
{{{
[size=%FontSize_Heading1%][b]%Title%[/b][/size]
[size=%FontSize_Body%]
            [u]Source:[/u] %Source%
         [u]Authoring:[/u] %Disc_Authoring%
              [u]Menu:[/u] %Disc_Menu%
            [u]Extras:[/u] %Disc_Extras%            
          [u]Web Link:[/u] %WebLink%            
[/size]

%General_Info%

[img]%ScreenshotFull%[/img]

%Video_Info%
%Audio_Info%
}}}
= DiscAudioInfo.txt =
{{{
[size=%FontSize_Heading2%][b][i]Audio %AudioID%:[/i][/b][/size]
[size=%FontSize_Body%]
            [u]Format:[/u] %Audio_%Format%
           [u]Bitrate:[/u] %Audio_Bitrate%
          [u]Channels:[/u] %Audio_Channels%
     [u]Sampling Rate:[/u] %Audio_SamplingRate%
[/size]
}}}
= DiscVideoInfo.txt =
{{{
[size=%FontSize_Heading2%][b][i]Video:[/i][/b][/size]
[size=%FontSize_Body%]
            [u]Format:[/u] %Video_Format%
             [u]Codec:[/u] %Video_Codec%
           [u]Bitrate:[/u] %Video_Bitrate%
          [u]Standard:[/u] %Video_Standard%
        [u]Frame Rate:[/u] %Video_FrameRate%
         [u]Scan Type:[/u] %Video_ScanType%
[u]Bits/(Pixel*Frame):[/u] %Video_BitsPerPixelFrame%
        [u]Resolution:[/u] %Video_Width%x%Video_Height%
[/size]
}}}
